identityIsARegisteredPublisher

public static java.lang.Boolean identityIsARegisteredPublisher(java.lang.String author)
                                                        throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Check if the identity has "Curator" in Contexts.

Parameters:
author - The public key hash for an identity is referred to in the source code as the identity's ID, yet the field name for it is the identity's "Identity".
Returns:
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

indexIsRegistered

public static java.lang.Boolean indexIsRegistered(java.lang.String author,
                                                  java.lang.String indexName)
                                           throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Check if the index is registered in WoT identity.

Parameters:
author - The public key hash for an identity is referred to in the source code as the identity's ID, yet the field name for it is the identity's "Identity".
Returns:
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

registerIndex

public static void registerIndex(java.lang.String author,
                                 java.lang.String indexFileName,
                                 java.lang.String propertyValue)
                          throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Sets the identity's property. It is use every time a new index is published by the identity.

Parameters:
author - The public key hash for an identity is referred to in the source code as the identity's ID, yet the field name for it is the identity's "Identity".
indexFileName - The index'name identifies the category, which classifies all content stored in the index.
propertyValue - The full USK address of the index, including version.
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

registerIdentity

public static void registerIdentity(java.lang.String author)
                             throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Sets the identity's context value. Identities that publish indexes need to include "Curator" in the context's values.

Parameters:
author - The public key hash for an identity is referred to in the source code as the identity's ID, yet the field name for it is the identity's "Identity".
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

getWoTIdentities

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getWoTIdentities()
                                                                         throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Get the nicknames of WoT identities. The map is <"ID", "Nickname (ID)">.

Returns:
Map of WoT identities.
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

getRequestURI

public static java.lang.String getRequestURI(java.lang.String author)
Get the request URI of a given author ID.

Parameters:
author - The public key hash for an identity is referred to in the source code as the identity's ID, yet the field name for it is the identity's "Identity".
Returns:
Request URI of this identity.

getWoTIdentities

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getWoTIdentities(java.lang.String field)
                                                                         throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Get a specific field from WoT identities. This function doesn't work for getting Contexts or Properties

Parameters:
field - Field to get, eg "Nickname" or "InsertURI".
Returns:
Map of the requested data.
Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException

sendPing

public static void sendPing()
                     throws freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException
Sends a "Ping" FCP message to the WoT plugin.

Throws:
freenet.pluginmanager.PluginNotFoundException - If the plugin is not loaded/not responding/buggy/whatever.
